action.action-desc: Mr. Sam Johnson of Texas (for himself, Mr. Cole, and Mr. Becerra) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To provide for additional space for the protection and preservation of national collections held by the Smithsonian Institution.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Smithsonian Collections Space Authorization Act.

section.header: Additional space and resources for national collections held by the Smithsonian Institution

subsection.text: Public Law 94–98 (20 U.S.C. 50 note; 89 Stat. 480) is amended by adding at the end the following:

section.header: Additional space and resources for national collections held by the Smithsonian Institution

subsection.text: The Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution may plan, design, and construct additional storage space for collections storage modules and hangar additions to the National Air and Space Museum Udvar-Hazy Center in Chantilly, Virginia, and additional storage and laboratory space at the Museum Support Center at the Suitland Collections Center in Suitland, Maryland, to accommodate the care, preservation, conservation, deposit, and study of national collections held in trust by the Institution.
There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section—
Section 3 of Public Law 94–98 (20 U.S.C. 50 note; 89 Stat. 480) is amended by striking “(other than section 4).” and inserting “(other than sections 4 and 5).”.
